title: IN Creation of Purchase Material Numbers
description:
Description
  For whom Telekom
who has to fulfill the order of a managed LAN / WiFi service
provides a list of requested hardware and licenses to
a responsible hub
for creating the “Einkaufsmaterialien” / Materialnummern
Different from Verkaufsmaterialnummern
optimizing Serving our internal processes

Business Scope:
The LAN/WiFi Managed Service is a combination of several Access Points, Switches, Licenses which have to be purchased by Juniper (over distributor). Therefore, “Einkaufsmaterialien” have to be created for our internal systems and a supplier processes have to be established. This is strongly related with Service Provisioning.
acceptance_criteria: Marterials are available in all relevant systems.
Marterials can be used via SD-X processes
Hardware / Licenses can be ordered using the materials with the established SD-X processes (same as Juniper SD-WAN)
